title: Hong Kong bans all flights from U.S. and seven other countries as omicron spreads
content:
1. Hong Kong bans all flights from U.S. and seven other countries as omicron spreads  The Washington Post
  2. Hong Kong Bans Flights, Shuts Nightlife After Omicron Bursts Pandemic-Free Bubble  The Wall Street Journal
  3. Hong Kong Bans Flights From U.S., Imposes Other COVID-19 Restrictions  HuffPost
  4. Hong Kong reimposes tough Covid-19 restrictions in bid to ward off fifth pandemic wave  South China Morning Post
  5. Hong Kong bans some inbound flights, tightens COVID-19 curbs  Reuters
